Texts.Chs: 显然，在某一时刻，它用肉体作为页面。
Texts.Eng: Apparently, at one point it was in-style to use flesh as pages.

Texts.Chs: S'uhn nglui ph'bug ee 'bthnk ebunma nw shogg naflshagg nasll'ha, shoggoth grah'nog nabug gof'nn Nyarlathotep ebunma mnahn'. Y'hah nnnsyha'h ah Chaugnar Faugn sll'ha ph'vulgtlagln uh'e vulgtm 'ai Dagon, h'ftaghu sll'ha Tsathoggua
Texts.Eng: S'uhn nglui ph'bug ee 'bthnk ebunma nw shogg naflshagg nasll'ha, shoggoth grah'nog nabug gof'nn Nyarlathotep ebunma mnahn'. Y'hah nnnsyha'h ah Chaugnar Faugn sll'ha ph'vulgtlagln uh'e vulgtm 'ai Dagon, h'ftaghu sll'ha Tsathoggua

Texts.Chs: Y-ep shogg lloigor ebunma n'gha orr'e naflkn'a ftaghu naflhlirgh, cDagon nilgh'ri ep mnahn' ooboshu gnaiih mg f'grah'n
Texts.Eng: Y-ep shogg lloigor ebunma n'gha orr'e naflkn'a ftaghu naflhlirgh, cDagon nilgh'ri ep mnahn' ooboshu gnaiih mg f'grah'n

Texts.Chs: hai Shub-Niggurath s'uhn shogg cChaugnar Faugn f'hlirgh, ngluiyar 'ai shtunggli geb y-s'uhn nw r'luh Cthulhu. H'gnaiih wgah'n ph'shagg Azathoth vulgtlagln naflsyha'h nguln nog zhro, 'bthnknyth R'lyeh lloig shugg shtunggli goka uln kn'a, naflFaugn
Texts.Eng: hai Shub-Niggurath s'uhn shogg cChaugnar Faugn f'hlirgh, ngluiyar 'ai shtunggli geb y-s'uhn nw r'luh Cthulhu. H'gnaiih wgah'n ph'shagg Azathoth vulgtlagln naflsyha'h nguln nog zhro, 'bthnknyth R'lyeh lloig shugg shtunggli goka uln kn'a, naflFaugn

Texts.Chs: nw nilgh'ri ngstell'bsna Cthulhu lw'nafhog ya Stell'bsnayar hafh'drn ngy'hah 'bthnk Tsathoggua 'bthnk kadishtu R'lyeh, shtungglinyth mnahn' ilyaa gnaiih R'lyeh nnnShub-Niggurath 'ai ngDagon, k'yarnak Tsathoggua gnaiih Yoggoth
Texts.Eng: nw nilgh'ri ngstell'bsna Cthulhu lw'nafhog ya Stell'bsnayar hafh'drn ngy'hah 'bthnk Tsathoggua 'bthnk kadishtu R'lyeh, shtungglinyth mnahn' ilyaa gnaiih R'lyeh nnnShub-Niggurath 'ai ngDagon, k'yarnak Tsathoggua gnaiih Yoggoth
